episode.title: Richmond Unified School District v. Berg

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 75-1069, Richmond's Unified School District against Sonja Lynn Berg and others -- in this case the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit is vacated in the cause is remanded for further consideration by that court in light of General Electric Company against Gilbert, and Nashville Gas Company against Satty and for consideration of possible mootness.
